posts.post_content: Hi, I have a few T cards FOR SALE 1909 T204 Al Bridwell Sold T.O. 1910 T212-2 Daley $33.00 1910 T212-2 Gardner $38.00 1910 T212-2 Howard $60.00 1911 T212-3 Abbott Saved Jack 1911 T212-3 Carlisle $38.00 1911 T3 Hughie Jennings (pinholes) $225.00 1911 T3 Slim Sallee (pinholes) $215.00 Postage/Insurance Paid, Satisfaction Guaranteed I accept PayPal only. Please send me a personal message here if interested. I dont have email access. thanks Frank
